title: Hunt for a cancer killer
creator_credit: Harold Mayer, Michael Sklar and McGraw-Hill Films
brief_description: A graphic account of science’s determined search for a chemical cure for cancer, outlining the promising work being done in the field of antibiotics. Includes interviews with scientists and visits to scientific laboratories and hospitals where tests and experiments are being carried out to produce a cancer-killing compound without harming healthy tissues.
